rows.label: tlk70000069_05_msg0001
rows.name:
If you're trying to chase the Holy
Grail and head for the Divine Beast's
core, you're going the wrong way.

rows.label: tlk70000069_05_msg0002
rows.name:
From here, head to Lake
Wynn. There should be a
wooded path by the lake.

rows.label: tlk70000069_05_msg0003
rows.name:
Follow the path for a bit and you
should come to a huge staircase. I
hope your glutes are ready for that.

rows.label: tlk70000069_05_msg0004
rows.name:
At the top of the staircase,
you'll find a gate that leads
to the Divine Beast's core.

rows.label: tlk70000069_05_msg0005
rows.name:
I have to warn you, though.
The king of Iira sealed up
the gate a long time ago.

rows.label: tlk70000069_05_msg0006
rows.name:
No one knows what you'll find beyond
the gate. Living or otherwise.

rows.label: tlk70000069_05_msg0007
rows.name:
In any case, no matter what you find
beyond the gate, it's bound to be
dangerous. Prepare yourselves.
